30.ara-name: كتاب الوصايا عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abu Hurairah narrated that the Messenger of Allah (S.A.W) said:"Indeed a man, and a woman, perform deeds in obedience to Allah for sixty years, then death presents itself to them, and they cause such harm in the will that the Fire becomes warranted for them."Then he recited: After payment of legacies he (or she) may have bequeathed or debts, without causing harm. This is a Commandment from Allah. up to His saying: That is the magnificent success

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الضِّرَارِ فِي الْوَصِيَّةِ
chapter.eng-name: What has been Related About Causing Harm With The Will
